name: Linda Jenkins
description: Linda Jenkins is Cheryl’s sister and close confidante, often exchanging long phone calls and book recommendations.

name: Michael Dawson
description: Michael Dawson is Cheryl’s hiking partner and lifelong companion, often found by her side during quiet mornings in the mountains.

name: USPS Asheville Main Post Office
description: USPS Asheville Main Post Office is where Cheryl regularly drops off orders for her bookstore, often chatting with familiar clerks at the counter.

name: Nora Patel
description: Nora Patel is part of Cheryl’s tight-knit community, often seen at book club meetings or lending a hand with small favors.

name: Gloria Ramirez
description: Gloria Ramirez is part of Cheryl’s tight-knit community, often seen at book club meetings or lending a hand with small favors.

name: Ethan Price
description: Ethan Price is part of Cheryl’s tight-knit community, often seen at book club meetings or lending a hand with small favors.

name: Sarah Kim
description: Sarah Kim is part of Cheryl’s tight-knit community, often seen at book club meetings or lending a hand with small favors.

name: Dr. Evelyn Hart
description: Dr. Evelyn Hart is Cheryl’s longtime dentist, known for gentle cleanings and good conversation during routine visits.

name: Lila Monroe
description: Lila Monroe styles Cheryl’s hair every few weeks, keeping things simple and classic with friendly updates on local happenings.

name: Blue Ridge Auto Service
description: Blue Ridge Auto Service is the local garage Cheryl trusts for inspections and oil changes before road trips or scenic drives.

name: American Booksellers Association
description: American Booksellers Association connects Cheryl to fellow indie booksellers, offering newsletters, resources, and occasional conferences.

name: Emma Wiles
description: Emma Wiles is Cheryl’s longtime friend and sketching buddy, often joining her on slow-paced travel adventures.

name: Sunny Point Cafe
description: Sunny Point Cafe is Cheryl’s favorite brunch spot, known for its fresh ingredients and quiet patio—perfect for journaling.

name: Asheville Civic Center
description: Asheville Civic Center hosts local author readings and seasonal events that Cheryl occasionally attends for inspiration or leisure.

name: Savannah Tour Company
description: Savannah Tour Company offers leisurely, story-rich tours that align perfectly with Cheryl’s love for history and local charm.

name: High Five Coffee
description: High Five Coffee is a cozy local spot Cheryl stops by after hikes, often sketching quietly while enjoying her favorite latte.
